definition: lit. old account/old debt/fig. old scores to settle/old quarrels/old grudge
to turn over old accounts/fig. to revive old quarrels/to reopen old wounds

sentences.english: Debt collectors buy old debts from companies or lenders for pennies on the dollar.
sentences.chinese: 債主從公司收舊賬或者跟債務人討小錢。
不要總翻舊賬，過去的就讓它過去吧。

sentences.english: Those hoping for speedy reckonings, however, will probably be disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 然而，那些期望迅速清理舊賬的人可能要失望了。
不要總翻舊賬，過往的就讓它過往吧。

sentences.english: MANY politicians use their memoirs to settle old scores.
sentences.chinese: 衆多政治家都在他們的回憶錄裏算舊賬揭老底。

sentences.english: Yes 2 thousand out of a Billion is NOT much. theres still plenty of them online that will bring up past issues &recently the islands?
sentences.chinese: 在網上仍然很多中國人翻舊賬和討論最近的島嶼問題。

sentences.english: I would get square with my rival on the first opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 我一有機會就要與對手算清舊賬。
